# Dedicated server GPU

## Dedicated servers with graphics cards

These allow a new form of very specialised use for **dedicated servers** :
advanced graphic uses (video retouching, CAD… ), scientific Proofs of Concept
and even crypto-currency mining with GPU.

  
  
  

  *   * 

### Dedicated server gpuHere is our range of dedicated servers with its many
configuration possibilities

#### See all our dedicated server offers gpu __

Stock Status __

ratio, these servers are perfect for testing AI or blockchain projects, or to
make a server for gaming, storage, emails…

professional IT solutions. Hosting, cybersecurity, outsourcing, Cloud, or even
unified communication with the support of SEWAN, everything is there to meet
the needs of today's and tomorrow's businesses.

# Dedicated Server **GPU Master**

  
  

  * ####  __Processor

1 CPU (8C/16T) **@3.6GHz**

 **Intel Core i9 9900K**

  * ####  __Graphics card

GeForce GTX 1070

 **8 GB GDDR5/1920 cores**

  * ####  __Random access memory

 **64 GB** DDR4

  * ####  __Bandwidth

 **1 Gbps**

  * ####  __Hard disk

 **1 TB** SSD NVMe

  * ####  __Availability

 **99.95%**

€151.19 exc.VAT/ Month

 __Order __

  

The **dedicated server GPU Master** is unusual in that it has a powerful
Geoforce GTX 1070 8GB GDDR5 1920 cores graphics card, which allows a new kind
of highly specialised use of dedicated servers: advanced graphics uses (video
editing, CAD, etc.), scientific Proof of Concept or even for mining crypto-
currency with GPU.

###  **The services included** with your _dedicated server_

  * ###### 24/7 technical support in France

Our technical teams are available to support you 24/24 and 7/7.

  * ###### Response in less than an hour

Technical intervention time guarantee (GTI) of one hour by telephone and 24
hours by e-mail.

  * ###### Dedicated and secure interfaces

Dedicated and secure customer interfaces to allow you to easily track your
invoices, statistics, reports, etc.

  * ###### Tested and certified components

All equipment and components sold have been tested and approved by our
experts.

  * ###### Hardware guarantee

Hardware guaranteed for the duration of the service.

  * ###### Proactive intervention

Our technical teams intervene as soon as a problem has been identified, even
when you have not noticed it.

 **Need more services with your server**Discover our service levels __

##### Technical Specifications Intel Core i9 9900K

Processor| Intel Core i9 9900K  
---|---  
Number of cores| 8  
Number of threads| 16  
Base frequency|  **3.60 GHz**  
Random access memory|  **64 GB** DDR4  
Storage|  **1 TB** SSD NVMe  
Graphics card|    **GeForce GTX1070** **8 GB** GDDR5/1920 Cores  
Connectivity|  **1 Gbs**  
Traffic|  **Unlimited**  
Availability rate|  **99.95%**  
IPv4 address|  **1** IPv4 address (up to 3 optional) __options  
Backup option| Veeam __options  
  
### Graphics card GeForce GTX 1070 8GB

  
The GeForce GTX 1070 **graphics card** delivers maximum speed and performance
and incorporates NVIDIA Pascal, the most powerful GPU architecture ever built.
NVIDIA Pascal architecture triples graphics card performance over previous
generation models using innovative gaming and virtual reality technologies.  
  

Nvidia Cuda Cores|  **1920**  
---|---  
Base frequency|  **1506 MHz**  
Memory speed|  **8 GB/s**  
Standard memory|  **8 GB GDDR5**  
Memory interface size| 256-bit  
Memory bandwidth| 256 GB/sec  
NVIDIA SLI® COMPATIBILITY| Yes  
NVIDIA COMPATIBILITY| Yes  
GAMESTREAM™GEFORCE SHADOWPLAY™| Yes  
NVIDIA GPU BOOST™| Yes  
NVIDIA GAMEWORKS™| Yes
